issue.title: [Plasma] Clean up eviction policy bookkeeping
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1829](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1829). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, the eviction policy has a field `memory_used_` which keeps track of how much memory the store is currently using. However, this field is only updated when `require_space` is called, and it should be updated every time an object is created.
